mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_address, user_phone, user_email, user_birth) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_address}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{user_birth})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_pw, u.user_name, u.user_address, u.user_phone, u.user_email, u.user_birth, a.role user_role FROM User u JOIN Auth a ON u.user_id = a.user_id
